dct_title_s: Meiji kaisei Tōkyō zenzu Sagano Hikotarō.
dct_description_sm: Copperplate print. In Japanese. Oriented with north to the upper right. Relief shown by hachures. Includes address charts by ward (ku), guide for tourists, time table, and legend. Shows views of tourist attractions. Inset: Yokohama shigaizu 2 sheets joined. 1 map: col.; 46 x 66 cm., folded to 18 x 10 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
